meta.description: Optimize the number of small and large suitcases to maximize the total number of snacks delivered.

sets.name: SUITCASES
sets.description: Types of suitcases available for sending snacks.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each type of suitcase in terms of number of snacks.

params.name: max_available
params.description: Maximum number of each type of suitcase available.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of suitcase to send.

objective.name: max_total_snacks
objective.description: Maximize the total number of snacks delivered.

constraints.name: small_large_ratio
constraints.description: At least twice as many small suitcases as large suitcases must be used.

constraints.name: max_small_suitcases
constraints.description: At most 70 small suitcases can be used.

constraints.name: max_large_suitcases
constraints.description: At most 50 large suitcases can be used.

constraints.name: min_large_suitcases
constraints.description: At least 15 large suitcases must be used.

constraints.name: max_total_suitcases
constraints.description: At most 70 suitcases in total can be used.
